title: Campaign mode
body: I reckon it would be pretty cool if there was a campaign mode on league, with a storyline that follows the lore of the different champs.

replies.body:
This would be a mammoth task I would imagine. Especially since there are like 140+ (?) champions in the game, that's a lot of code to produce..

But awesome idea too I think, I would definitely get into that.

Also, they butcher the lore every time a  new champ gets released just to fit them in. i men look what happened when azir hit. everyone from that part of runeterra got a lore "update". hell i am still sore about not being summoners anymore.
an offline mode would be pretty cool too
